io.parallec.core.taskbuilder.targethosts

Interface ITargetHostsBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TargetHostsBuilder

    public interface ITargetHostsBuilder
    The Interface to build the target hosts. Will remove duplicates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the target hosts from cms query url.

      Sets the target hosts from line by line text.

      Sets the target hosts from list.

    • Method Detail

      • setTargetHostsFromList

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> setTargetHostsFromList(java.util.List<java.lang.String> targetHosts)
        Sets the target hosts from list. Will remove duplicate from it. Will create a new array list because the original one may be unmodifiable.
        Parameters:
        targetHosts - the target hosts
        Returns:
        the list
